match.authors: Sumanth Dathathri, Andrea Madotto, Janice Lan, Jane Hung, Eric Frank, Piero Molino, J. Yosinski, Rosanne Liu
match.title: Plug and Play Language Models: A Simple Approach to Controlled Text Generation

citance.context: A KL penalty was also used by Dathathri et al. (2020), this time in a plug-and-play rather than a fine-tuning context.
